text: This is a list of rivers in Iraq. ==Persian Gulf== *Shatt al-Arab **Euphrates ***Shatt al-Hayy or Gharraf Canal, distributary of the Tigris ***Wadi al-Khirr ***Wadi al-Ubayyid ***Wadi al-Ghadaf ***Wadi Tharthar ***Wadi Hawran **Tigris ***Diyala River ****Alwand River ***Al Uzaym River or Adhaim River ****Khasa River ***Little Zab ***Great Zab ****Khazir River ***Khabur River ==Syrian Desert== *Wadi al-Mirah *Wadi Hamir *Wadi Ar'ar *Wadi al Batin ==References== *Rand McNally, The New International Atlas, 1993. * Iraq Iraq rivers
title: List of rivers of Iraq
